mapper.insert: insert into pms_member_price (id, product_id, member_level_id, member_price, member_level_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberLevelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberLevelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, product_id, member_level_id, member_price, member_level_name from pms_member_price
